title: erigon run eth-archive-node : block fall behind the mainnet
body:
I run eth-archive-node :  ./build/bin/erigon --datadir=/opt/data/ethdata/ --chain=mainnet  --externalcl  --torrent.download.slots 7 --torrent.download.rate 32mb  --port=30303 --http.port=8545 --private.api.addr=172.16.10.10:9090 --authrpc.addr=0.0.0.0 --http.addr=0.0.0.0 --authrpc.vhosts='*'  --http.corsdomain '*' --http.vhosts '*' --authrpc.jwtsecret=/opt/data/ethdata/jwt.hex --http --ws --http.api eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool

erigon version 2.31.0-stable,  block fall behind the mainnet 1500
erigon version 2.30.0-stable, block fall behind the mainnet 100
erigon version v2.28.1,  block fall behind the mainnet 10
erigon version 2022.08.03, block fall behind the mainnet 0

How can I solve this problem?  How to speed up synchronization?  is beacon-chain's problem??

otherï¼šUsing different versions, the configuration remains the same

-- Logs begin at Thu 2022-06-16 06:26:16 UTC. --

Keep stay  [9/16 IntermediateHashes] ETL [2/2] 

Is it related to this parameterï¼š
**--sync.loop.throttle value                     Sets the minimum time between sync loop starts (e.g. 1h30m, default is none)**
